listitem.para: Shuts down a connection that was created with NETCONNECTON.

listitem.programlisting:
; This example assumes remotemachinename is listening on socket 5124) NETSTARTUP ; Start up the network SHOW NETCONNECTON "remotemachinename 5124 [PRINT [ready to send again]] [PRINT [I have something]] true
NETCONNECTOFF NETSHUTDOWN
